projects.name: Gi1 Prime App
projects.shortDesc: A comprehensive application for Gi1 Super App company.
projects.fullDetail: Features include a coins mining system, leaderboard, dynamic quizzes and forms with feedback, multipurpose notification system, user privacy encryption, industry-specific discussions with replies and likes, and a fully dynamic architecture.

projects.name: SmugLinks
projects.shortDesc: An integrated Android and web platform for creating and managing links with QR codes.
projects.fullDetail: Allows users to create redirect links and generate customized QR codes with 400+ design options. Premium members have unlimited link creation and advanced QR code customization. Ideal for business persons and shopkeepers. Available on Google Play Store and the web.

projects.name: ByteBuddy
projects.shortDesc: A comprehensive resource for BCA and Computer Science students.
projects.fullDetail: Includes a vast collection of verified notes, multi-language translations, offline listening, user-uploaded notes, and a community Q&A section with upvote and downvote features.

projects.name: IBC E-LEARNING
projects.shortDesc: Modern e-learning platform with high-quality layouts and features.
projects.fullDetail: Offers personal chatting with classmates and faculty, regular notes, and circular updates.

projects.name: Social
projects.shortDesc: A futuristic social media platform with AI integration.
projects.fullDetail: Features AI interaction, friend connections, meme and post sharing. Small app size under 20 MB.

projects.name: Swipe Player
projects.shortDesc: Offline video player with machine learning-based management.
projects.fullDetail: Automatically plays or pauses video based on eye detection. Small app size of 3-4 MB.

projects.name: Heavens Gate
projects.shortDesc: Connects people to NGOs and Islamic organizations.
projects.fullDetail: Features user types for organization managers and donors, with a payment gateway for donations.

projects.name: Billing App
projects.shortDesc: Helps shopkeepers manage customer records and daily reports.
projects.fullDetail: Generates customer receipts in PDF format, works offline, supports data backup and restore, generates Excel files, and syncs contacts for promotional sharing via WhatsApp.
